item.title: The global economy will be hit hard by Trump's tariffs, IMF warns - NPR
item.description:

  2. Why the IMF is worried about the economy - three things to know  BBC

  4. Trump’s trade war will hit US prosperity hard, IMF warns  CNN
  5. Wednesday Briefing: A Downgrade in Global Growth  The New York Times
